title: 裝備
texttw: 良好的配件有助於我們取得更好的成績，我們可以利用[ff6060]突觸強化[-]來增加自身的能力！！
texten: Better equipment can help us get better grades. We can use [ff6060]Synaptic Upgrade[-]  to enhance our ability!!

texttw: 我們先來強化可以有效提升[ff6060]射籃命中率[-]的[ff6060]顱部插件[-]吧！！
texten: Let's first upgrade [ff6060]Head Widget[-]  so that we can effectively raise [ff6060]FG Percentage[-] !!

texttw: 只要點擊右邊的[ff6060]鑲嵌材料[-]，即可進行第一階段的強化囉。
texten: Just press [ff6060]Embedding Material[-]  on the right hand side to conduct stage 1 upgrade.

texttw: 當插件已經鑲嵌滿星星後，即可進行[ff6060]進化合成[-]了，進化後可大幅提升自身能力值喔。
texten: When the widget is embedded with stars, we can then conduct an [ff6060]Evolution Synthesis[-] . Your ability will be greatly enhanced after the evolution.

texttw: 有沒有感覺自己的能力又更上一層了呢？
texten: Did you feel more powerful?

title: Avatar
texttw: 剛剛的勝利獲得了很酷的[ff6060]造型服裝[-]喔，快來搭配屬於自己的造型吧。
texten: We just obtained a cool-looking [ff6060]Costumes[-]  from our victory. Let's put it on!

texttw: 選擇[ff6060]背部飾品[-]種類。
texten: Select [ff6060]Back Accessory[-] .

texttw: 造型服裝都有限定的[ff6060]時限[-]，除非把它買下來，否則時間到期就不能再穿了。
texten: Each costume has their own [ff6060]Time Limit[-] . Unless you bought them, you cannot equip them after the time limit exceeds.

texttw: 點擊[ff6060]物品圖示[-]就可以把它穿起來了！！
texten: Press [ff6060]Item Icon[-]  to get dressed up!!

texttw: 哇，好看極了！！可以穿出去嚇嚇對手囉！！
texten: Wow, you look great!! Now let's go intimidate some people!!

texttw: 現在我們繼續挑戰下一組對手吧！！
texten: Now let's challenge our next group of opponents!!

title: 商店
texttw: 隨著競賽的進行，可能會有些資源上的不足，聯盟這邊有一個[ff6060]購物商店[-]可以讓您補充自己想要的東西。
texten: As the game goes own, you may lack some resources. There is a [ff6060]Shopping Mall[-]  in the league that can help provide you with with necessities.

texttw: 這邊有眾多豐富的商品，分別可以使用 [ff00eb]寶石[-]、[fff300]金幣[-]、[a200ff]聯盟幣[-]、[00ff6b]社群幣[-] 來進行購買。
texten: There are many items available. You can use [ff00eb]Gems[-] , [fff300]Coins[-] , [a200ff]League Coins[-]  or [00ff6b]Society Coins[-]  to buy them.

texttw: 各商店的商品每隔一段時間會進行[ff6060]更換[-]，記得要常常回來逛逛是否有[ff6060]新商品上架[-]唷。
texten: The items in each shop will be [ff6060]Replaced[-]  once in a while, so remember to check them out occasionally to see if [ff6060]New Items[-]  are available.

texttw: 如果等不及想要快點看看有什麼新商品，可以點擊下方的[ff6060]刷新按鈕[-]，就可以立即的更換新的商品喔！！！
texten: If you can't wait to check our those new items, press the [ff6060]Refresh[-]  button at the bottom to get new items immediately!!!

title: 社群
texttw: 由於你前幾場競賽搶眼的表現，我們發現有其他球員開始在[ff6060]關注[-]你的動態唷！！
texten: Given your great performance in the few previous games, we found out that some other players are now [ff6060]Following[-]  your status!!

texttw: 這麼酷，快帶我瞧瞧是誰在關注我！！
texten: Cool. Let's check out who's following me!!

texttw: 這邊有許多來自各地的優秀球員，你可以選擇其中一位球員進行[ff6060]關注[-]！！
texten: There are many great players from other places. You can choose one player to [ff6060]Follow[-] !!

texttw: 你已經成功關注他了，現在你可以在[ff6060]動態牆[-]上看到你所有關注朋友的動態消息喔！！
texten: You have successfully started following them. Now you can check out all their status and messages of the friends you follow on the [ff6060]Status Stream[-] !!

texttw: 接下我們來幫被你關注的朋友點個[ff6060]讚[-]吧！！
texten: Now let's [ff6060]Like the Status[-]  of the friend you follow!!

texttw: 只要你在朋友的動態訊息上點擊[ff6060]讚[-]，就可以獲得[ff6060]社群幣[-]唷，可以讓你去購買[ff6060]社群商店的商品[-]。
texten: If you [ff6060]Like the Status[-]  of your friend, you can receive [ff6060]Society Coins[-] . You can use those coins to purchase [ff6060]Items at Society Shop[-] .

title: Skill
texttw: 剛剛獲得到一張[ff6060]技能晶片[-]，這是幹嘛的呀？
texten: I just got a piece of [ff6060]Skill Chip[-] . What is this for?

texttw: [ff6060]技能晶片[-]是運用科技，讓我們能夠獲得超乎常人的能力，如果晶片運用得當，將對比賽的結果造成[ff6060]決定性的影響[-]。我來教你怎麼安裝它。
texten: [ff6060]Skill Chips[-]  are items that can provide us with super powered with technology. If we use them properly, it will bring about [ff6060]Decisive Influence[-]  to the games. Let me teach you how to install them.

texttw: 首先我們可以先往下一場競賽邁進。
texten: First we will go to the next game.

texttw: 繼續點擊[ff6060]競賽開始[-]。
texten: Press [ff6060]Start Game[-] .

texttw: 在開始競賽前，我們快把剛剛獲得的[ff6060]技能晶片[-]裝上吧！！
texten: Before the game, now let's install the [ff6060]Skill Chip[-]  we just got!!

texttw: 技能晶片分為[ff6060]主動技[-]跟[ff6060]被動技[-]，只要[ff6060]點擊[-]技能晶片，即可開啟對應的功能。
texten: Skill chips can be divided into [ff6060]Active Skills[-]  and [ff6060]Passive Skills[-] . You can open corresponding skills by just [ff6060]Pressing [-]  "Skill Chip".

texttw: 接下來點擊[ff6060]裝備晶片[-]即可將晶片安裝到自己身上。
texten: Then press [ff6060]Install Chip[-]  to install it into your body.

texttw: 這樣就完成了，他已經出現[ff6060]右側[-]的已安裝區，我們可以按[ff6060]上一步[-]回到剛剛的賽前準備區了。
texten: Installation complete. It is now on the installed area at the [ff6060]Right Hand Side[-] . We can now press [ff6060]Previous Step[-]  and return to the pre-game preparation area.

texttw: 接下來就是去競賽中大展身手囉！！
texten: Next is to showcase your skills in the game!!

title: 任務
texttw: 經歷了幾場競賽，你已經累積了屬於自己的成績，聯盟這邊有幫你準備[ff6060]任務成就[-]的統計，可以讓你檢視自己辛苦的成果。
texten: After a few games, you have accumulated some grades of your own. The league has prepared a list of [ff6060]Accomplished Missions[-]  so you can examine the results of your hard works.

texttw: 目前你已經達成球員生涯的第一項任務，往後還有更多的挑戰等你來達成喔。
texten: You have just accomplished the first mission in your career. There are many more challenges awaiting you.

texttw: 可以領取你剛剛達成的任務獎勵！！
texten: You can receive the rewards for the mission you just accomplished!!

title: 晶片抽取
texttw: 我輸了，為了履行承諾，我有一個大禮要給你！
texten: You have my word. I have something for you.

texttw: 真的嗎？是什麼大禮？
texten: What?

texttw: 這裡的[ff6060]技能抽取[-]可以讓你快速擁有更多的籃球技巧，每天都有[ff6060]免費[-]的次數可以進行抽取！！
texten: [ff6060]Skill Draw[-]  can enhance your ability rapidly. [ff6060]Free[-]  drawing turns are available everyday!!

texttw: 記得在倒數時間結束後再回來抽取。
texten: Remember to come back for more draws before the time limit ends.

texttw: 既然你已經從我這得到好處，那你就得再和我打一場比賽，如果我還是輸給你，我會把我的絕活傳授給你。
texten: I will teach you my talant.

texttw: 那有什麼問題，一言為定！
texten: A Deal.

title: PVP
texttw: 嗨，明日之星您好！！
texten: Hello, rising star!!

texttw: 哈哈，你這樣稱呼我會讓我受寵若驚！！
texten: Ha ha, I'm flattered!!

texttw: 是這樣的，由於您優異的表現，獲得了[ff6060]宇宙聯盟總會[-]的關注，因此總會想要邀請您加入宇宙聯盟的聯賽，讓您有機會與宇宙中的強者有[ff6060]一較高下[-]的機會。
texten: It's like this, given your great performance, the [ff6060]Cosmos League Association[-]  have noticed you and wants to invite you to participate in the games of Cosmos League. This will give you the opportunity to [ff6060]Compete[-]  against the best players in this universe.

texttw: 加入聯盟之後會有豐厚的報酬等著您喔。
texten: Abundant rewards will also be waiting for you after you are a member of this league.

texttw: 這麼酷，那我當然要加入。
texten: Cool. I'm in.

texttw: 太好了，讓我來告訴您該如何加入！！
texten: Great!! Let me tell you how to join this league!!

texttw: 在這裡選擇進入[ff6060]聯盟挑戰[-]。
texten: Select [ff6060]League Challenge[-]  here.

texttw: 一開始您會從[ff6060]街頭聯盟[-]開始打起，隨著積分的改變，將會決定您聯盟等級的升降，越高級的聯盟可以獲得越高的報酬喔！！
texten: First you will begin with [ff6060]Streetball League[-] . As your point accumulates, you will either be promoted or demoted to other leagues. The higher the league, the better the rewards!!

texttw: 現在來開始您的第一次挑戰吧！！
texten: Now let's start your first challenge!!

title: 副本
texttw: 生涯競賽中的每個關主都有屬於他們的籃球故事，快來挑戰他們體驗他們的故事，打贏他們甚至有機會獲得他們身上的[ff6060]寶物[-]或珍貴的[ff6060]技能晶片[-]喔！！
texten: In career games, each BOSS has a basketball story of their own. Challenge these games to experience their story. If you beat them, you may acquire [ff6060]Items[-]  or precious [ff6060]Skill Chips[-]  they carry!!

texttw: 我早就想要再次跟他們多多學習，快跟我說怎樣找到他們！
texten: I wanted to learn from them a long time ago. Tell me how to find them!

texttw: 這就是你之前遇到的關主，現在可以再次挑戰他囉！！不過要注意，他們這次不會放水了，會拿出真本事來對付你唷！！並且你要注意這系列挑戰的[ff6060]特性[-]。
texten: This is the BOSS you've met before and you can challenge him again!! But remember, he is going to beat you with all he has right now!! Also, you have to pay attention to the [ff6060]Attributes[-]  of this series of challenges.

texttw: 這邊開始有一些前置關卡，當你挑戰完這些關卡後，就可以正式挑戰關主了，加油！！
texten: There are some preliminary stages first. After finishing these stages, you can then challenge the BOSS. Let's go!!

texttw: 隨著您的成長，聯盟這邊有準備一些[ff6060]每日考驗[-]給您，只要您完成考驗，就可以獲得到獎勵喔！！
texten: While you improve, the league has prepared some [ff6060]Daily Trials[-]  for you. You will be awarded if you accomplish these trials!!

texttw: 這邊的考驗都是[ff6060]每天計算[-]一次喔，所以要把握時間完成他們喔！！
texten: The trials here will be [ff6060]Recalculated Daily[-] . Remember to seize your opportunities to accomplish them!!

texttw: 我現在來帶你完成
texten: Let me guide you to accomplish them.

title: 投點教學
texttw: 嗨，這裡是[ff6060]潛能成長[-]區，在這裏可以激發自己的潛能，讓自己的能力更上一層樓喔！！
texten: Hello, here is [ff6060]Potential Growth[-]  area. Here we can educe your potential and improve your ability!!

texttw: 哇，是喔，那該怎麼提升自己的能力啊！！
texten: Wow, really!! How can I improve myself?

texttw: 只要你每次[ff6060]提升等級[-]，都可以獲得[ff6060]潛能點[-]。
texten: Every time you [ff6060]Increase your Level[-] , you can acquire [ff6060]Potential Points[-] .

texttw: 提升每一個屬性的需求潛能點數量都不相同，要謹慎分配唷！完成後記得要點擊[ff6060]確認投點[-]的按鈕，才算正式完成！
texten: The potential points needed for each attribution is different, so distribute them cautiously! Remember to press [ff6060]Confirm Distribution[-]  button to complete the distribution!

title: 技能升星
texttw: 剛剛獲得[ff6060]我愛籃球黑幫[-]技能晶片，這又是幹嘛的呀？
texten: I just got a skill chip called [ff6060]I Love Basketball Gang[-] . What is this for?

texttw: 這是個好東西！！這張晶片可以幫助你提升你擁有的技能晶片強度喔！！
texten: This is great stuff!! This chip can help you upgrade the skill chips you already have!!

texttw: 這麼厲害！！快教我怎麼強化！！
texten: Really?? Teach me how to upgrade now!!

texttw: 右側有一些你現在擁有的技能晶片，所有晶片都可以作為強化的材料，不過注意，晶片被當作強化後就會消失了！！
texten: The skill chips you now own are showed on your right side and all of them can be used for upgrades. But remember, once you've used a chip to make na upgrade, it will disappear!!

texttw: 選擇剛剛的[ff6060]我愛籃球黑幫[-]技能晶片作為材料吧。
texten: Let's select the [ff6060]I Love Basketball Gang[-]  skill chip as upgrade material.

texttw: 這樣就強化成功囉！！
texten: The upgrade is then complete!!

title: 套卡教學
texttw: 嘿！看這裡！我為你設計了一個超酷的新系統，快來瞧瞧！
texten: Hey! Look here! I created a new system for you!

texttw: 哇⋯這是什麼呀？
texten: Wow ⋯ What is this?

texttw: 這是[ff6060]『圖鑑系統』[-]，現在先介紹第一個[ff6060]『晶片圖鑑』[-]。
texten: This is [ff6060] "GUIDE" [-], and now introduce the first one - [ff6060] "Card Album" [-].

texttw: 這裏收集了可以集合成[ff6060]『套卡』[-]的技能晶片卡！
texten: There are many Skill Cards what can be [ff6060] "Card Sets" [-].

texttw: 套卡皆由[ff6060]指定的三張技能晶片卡[-]組成，必須三張都收集到了才能啟動套卡功能！
texten: Combination of [ff6060] 3 cards[-] into a Card Sets. And tap the [ff6060] LAUNCH BUTTON[-] !

texttw: 接著[ff6060]提升技能晶片卡的星等[-]來收集星星數，[ff6060]總數[-]越多、能夠加成的能力就越好！
texten: Improve the level of cards to get more stars. The more stars in a Card Set, the more additions are unlocked.

texttw: 這是這組套卡可以啟動的第一階段能力加成。
texten: This is the first phase of this Card Set can be start.

texttw: 這裏可以查看該[ff6060]套卡的各個階段[-]，不同階段有不同的數量目標，也會有更佳的能力加成！
texten: Here you can see [ff6060]each phase[-] of Card Sets.

texttw: 這個新系統如何？還不賴吧！
texten: It's a nice system, right?

title: 套裝教學
texttw: 太好了！我完成了[ff6060]『圖鑑』[-]系統的另一個功能，讓我為你介紹！
texten: Wonderful! I finished the system of[ff6060] "GUIDE" [-], let me introduce you!

texttw: 上次的是晶片圖鑑，那這次的就是[ff6060]『套裝圖鑑』[-]囉！
texten: Last time is the Card Album, and this time is[ff6060] "Style Album" [-].

texttw: 沒錯！這裡可以一覽所有的造型，而所有造型皆有各自的完整套裝。
texten: Yes! You can check out all of Styles here.

texttw: 造型套裝不需要啟動，只要在同組套裝中擁有[ff6060]兩件以上的造型[-]，就會有收集加成！
texten: Style Sets do not need to be activated. Characters who own [ff6060]more than one[-] style from a [ff6060]particular Set[-] receive special bonuses.

texttw: 同時擁有右側的『對應晶片』就能降低裝備該晶片的空間值。
texten: While reducing the Cards Cost if you have [ff6060]Specified Cards[-] on the right side.

texttw: 最後要注意，[ff6060]『買斷造型』[-]才能算入圖鑑收集裡，[ff6060]時效性造型沒有收集效果[-]！
texten: Attention! [ff6060]Time-limited Styles[-] CAN NOT unlock bonuses! You have to BUY and OWN the Styles!

texttw: 這些就是我為你設計的圖鑑系統啦！這可是我的傑作！
texten: That's all! This is my masterpiece!

title: 主介面
texttw: 這就是將來會發生的事...若不在未來贏得這場比賽，這個星球會毀滅的！
texten: This is what's going to happen…If you don't win this game, this planet will be destroyed!

texttw: 我知道了！但我該如何開始呢？
texten: I see! But where should start?

texttw: 我們得贏得這一屆星際籃球大賽的冠軍，才能改變未來的結局！
texten: We can change our future by winning the champion of the first Star Basketball Games!

texttw: 先從成為出色的籃球員開始，競賽能累積豐厚的經驗以及獎金，不僅能償還債務！也能朝目標邁進！
texten: First, you need to become a good basketball player. You can win abundant EXP and money through games. This way, you not only can pay your debts, you can also work towards your goal!

texttw: 債務⋯哎～明明就是你撞破我家的屋頂⋯。
texten: Debt… Sigh~ It was you who ruined my roof.

texttw: 哈哈哈，先別說這個了！我們進入[ff6060]生涯競賽[-]－
texten: Ha ha ha, forget about that! Let's now proceed to [ff6060]Career Games[-]  -

texttw: 再來選擇第一場競賽－
texten: Then let's select the first game -

texttw: 確認這場比賽的[ff6060]獲勝條件[-]之後，就可以繼續進入下一步了。
texten: After confirming this game's [ff6060]Winning Requirements[-] , you can proceed to the next step.

texttw: 這裡是你這場比賽的[ff6060]隊友[-]，確認完畢就可以開始競賽了。
texten: This is your [ff6060]teammates[-]  of this game. You can start the game after confirmation.

title: 第二關打完
texttw: 哇，連續取得獲勝耶，接下來我們將要直接挑戰黑幫之王絕殺比爾，為了確保勝利，這裏有一個可以瞬間強化我們自身能力的注射劑，我來教你如何使用吧！
texten: Wow, we are getting consecutive wins. Let's challenge our next opponents!!

texttw: 選擇剛剛獲得到的注射劑。
texten: This game's winning requirements require us to make [ff6060]3PT FG[-] . We can change the tactic of this game so everybody can take 3s.

texttw: 這樣就設定完畢了，我們可以直接去挑戰他們囉。
texten: Now the setting is complete and we can challenge them.

title: 通過第一章
texttw: 哇，您已經成功挑戰了第一章節的關主，我們可以離開貧民窟，往下一章邁進囉。
texten: Wow, you've defeated the BOSS of the Chapter 1. We can now leave the slum and go to the next chapter.

title: 取名
texttw: 由於你前幾場競賽搶眼的表現，我們發現有其他球員開始在[ff6060]關注[-]你的動態唷！！
texten: Given your great performance in the previous games, we found out that other players are starting to [ff6060]Follow[-]  you!!

texttw: 但是，我還不知道你的名字呢？
texten: But I don't know your name yet?

texttw: 喔，我叫...
texten: Oh, my name is…

title: PVP結束後
texttw: 恭喜您獲得聯盟賽首場勝利，正式加入宇宙聯盟賽的體系！！這是您加入的報酬！！
texten: Congratulations for winning the first League Game and formally a member of the Cosmos League!! These are your rewards!!

texttw: 今後您可以每天回來這裏領取您的[ff6060]聯盟薪資[-]，切記，聯盟層級越高，報酬也越高喔！！
texten: From now on, you can come back and get your [ff6060]League Salary[-]  everyday. Remember, the higher your league level, the better the pay!!

texttw: 真是糟糕，居然掉進時空夢境中，我們必須擊敗對面的腐化者三天王才行！
texten: Oh no! They are Argus, Spectre and Siren! We have to win this game!

texttw: 不過別擔心，跟著我的指示做就能離開夢境！
texten: But don't worry about that! Stick with me!

title: 新教學
texttw: 頭頂[ff6666]紅色[-]三角形的球員是你自己，你只能移動你自己的角色。
texten: The player with [ff6666]Red[-]  triangle on your head is yourself. You can only move your character.

texttw: 你只可以操作紅色三角形頭標球員移動。
texten: You can only control the player with red triangle on its head.

texttw: 現在，先操作搖桿移動到指定的地方吧！
texten: Now let's control the console and move the player to the designated spot!

texttw: 旁邊[6666ff]藍色[-]、[66ff66]綠色[-]三角形頭標的球員是你的隊友，你無法控制他們的移動。
texten: The players with [6666ff]Blue[-]  and [66ff66]Green[-]  triangles on their head are your teammates. You can't control them.

texttw: [6666ff]藍色[-]頭標是隊友A
texten: [6666ff]Blue[-]  triangle is teammate A

texttw: [66ff66]綠色[-]頭標是隊友B
texten: [66ff66]Green[-]  triangle is teammate B

texttw: 既然敵方防守球員站那麼遠，我們給他們一個驚喜吧！！
texten: Since the opponent is backing off, let's given them a surprise!!

texttw: 趁他們不注意，我們可以來嘗試一下抄截。
texten: We can try to steal the ball while they are not noticing.

texttw: 首先移動到指定的位置！！
texten: First move to the designated spot!!

texttw: 趁現在可以使用抄截了！！
texten: Now we can steal the ball!!

texttw: 瞧他們慌亂的，小心，有兩位敵對球員正朝你而來。
texten: Look how nervous they are. Watch out, there can two players coming towards you.

texttw: 可以使用肘擊，防止他們靠近。
texten: You can elbow them to prevent them from getting too close to you.

texttw: 趁現在有空擋了，可以試著傳給隊友。
texten: Try and pass the ball to your teammate when he is open.

texttw: 也可以再指揮隊友回傳給你！！
texten: You can also ask your teammate to pass the ball back to you!!

texttw: 好啦，不要玩了，該給他們一個再見絕殺了。
texten: Okay, let's stop playing. It's time to give them a gamer.

texttw: 這場競賽我們必須要達成限定的[fff400]2分球次數[-]，才可以取得這個關卡的勝利。
texten: We need to get required[fff400]2PT FGs[-]  to win this game.

texttw: 條件有點困難，所以要記得要好好利用剛剛所安裝的[fff400]技能晶片[-]喔！！
texten: It's a bit hard, so we need to utilize the [fff400]Skill Chip[-]  we just installed!!

texttw: 戰況有些膠著，我們要好好把握這次的進攻！！
texten: We are now in a stalemate, so we need to seize this offensive opportunity!!

texttw: 適時的喊話讓士氣提升了不少耶。
texten: Prompt communication responses can greatly rise your morale.

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 立正！我是地獄司令。接下來我會特訓你！
texten: WHO ARE YOU?

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 確保我們有實力擊敗黑幫老大，拿到他提供的冠軍獎金！
texten: Well, in fact I'm from the future.

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 接著便是拿到正式球員的資格，繼續努力！稍息！
texten: My master - Joe, Let me return to the past, to find future opportunities can be changed.

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 黑、黑幫老大？
texten: And where is your master ⋯ Joe?

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 情報顯示，黑幫老大是個灌籃好手，最擅長的是雙手爆扣。
texten: Great, great! You're getting much too!

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 不過別擔心，你的勝率是50%！
texten: Just a few games that just make you! And this "lore Bill" contest pointers it!

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 不知死活的傢伙，我可不是好惹的！
texten: OK.. you can dunk, but can you shoot? [fff400] Show me a 3-pointer[-]and [fff400] 2-pointer[-]  if you wanna move on.

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 打敗絕殺比爾，拿到獎金吧！
texten: Come on! Last level was hell and now this?

title: 成為勇士吧-1
texttw: 要確實提高比賽的勝率，千萬別忘了在賽前檢查技能晶片的裝備、戰術的配置！
texten: Before into the game, do not forget to check out the "Skill Card".

title: 成為勇士吧-4
texttw: 太好了！我們現在是正式球員，將可以參加星際聯盟大賽。
texten: You won the qualifying, but you live in slums has heard the bad news - there is a mysterious army is attacking the slums!

title: 成為勇士吧-4
texttw: 但在星際聯盟大賽開始前，我們要多多參加其他比賽，好增加實力！
texten: Oh no! I have to go back!

title: 成為勇士吧-4
texttw: 這時候貧民窟傳來了遭到攻擊的消息！
texten: Of Course! Hurry up!

title: 成為勇士吧-4
texttw: 什麼！我必須回去看看！

title: 突然出現的強敵-1
texttw: 天啊！這些傢伙是誰？連絕殺比爾都…
texten: You came home, and face of powerful enemies!

title: 突然出現的強敵-1
texttw: 嘖！又來了礙事的傢伙…

title: 突然出現的強敵-1
texttw: 吉爾老大吩咐了，全部解決掉！

title: 突然出現的強敵-1
texttw: 可惡，我不會讓你們得逞的！

title: 突然出現的強敵-4
texttw: 這傢伙…是腐化者吉爾！我們果然碰上了。
texten: You beat a powerful enemy, they suddenly disappeared.

title: 突然出現的強敵-4
texttw: 呵呵呵…原來是將宙能之聚據為己有的守護者們啊…你們也追來了…
texten: What strange opponent!

title: 突然出現的強敵-4
texttw: 少耍嘴皮子，你們別想找到宙能之聚！
texten: They are really strange and evil, but now we have more important things to do it!

title: 突然出現的強敵-4
texttw: 呵呵…看來是要比比…哪方陣營先找到囉？

title: 突然出現的強敵-4
texttw: 這個人是…我知道了，我知道了！哈哈哈哈哈！

title: 列車競賽開始！-1
texttw: 阿隆加，那個叫吉爾的男人，究竟是什麼人啊？
texten: Stadium on the train! ?

title: 列車競賽開始！-1
texttw: 他是後期的腐化者，也是導致星球毀滅的元凶之一！一定要小心他。
texten: Yes! This is the most important contest before the Star Alliance Game!

title: 列車競賽開始！-1
texttw: 對了，爭霸賽的積分一定要拿高，可以減少將來在星際聯盟大賽的比賽場次。
texten: We had better make a good showing!

title: 列車競賽開始！-1
texttw: 不過這次我們對上的都是各地種子隊，可千萬別輕敵。

title: 列車競賽開始！-5
texttw: 太好了，這一階段的比賽積分輕鬆到手。
texten: Our performance was great! Successfully Passed!

title: 列車競賽開始！-5
texttw: 看來打進高級聯盟，真是小事一件！

title: 相知相惜的英雄-1
texttw: 嘿！我是布魯托，想和我們鬥一場牛嗎？
texten: Very Good! Keep working hard!

title: 相知相惜的英雄-1
texttw: 你就是布魯托？這有什麼問題！

title: 相知相惜的英雄-5
texttw: 哈哈哈！很久沒有痛快地打一場球了！對了，你為什麼要參加比賽？
texten: You met a worthy adversary.

title: 相知相惜的英雄-5
texttw: 我要打入星際聯盟大賽，成為星際球王！你呢？
texten: Your strength is very strong! What's your name?

title: 相知相惜的英雄-5
texttw: 我也要成為星際球王！看來我們將來一定會對決的。
texten: My name is Pluto! Except you, no competition for me!

title: 相知相惜的英雄-5
texttw: 哈哈哈，那就約在星際聯盟大賽上見了！
texten: We can play a real basketball game!

title: 相知相惜的英雄-5
texttw: 對，到時候見！
texten: Next time, we will meet on the Star Alliance Game!

title: 急凍地帶-1
texttw: 那位布魯托，身上有著熟悉的氣息…。

title: 急凍地帶-1
texttw: 是什麼呢…唔，想不起來！頭痛、頭痛！

title: 急凍地帶-1
texttw: 萊達、萊達！別想了，我發現有些球隊落敗後，完全失去籃球技能！

title: 急凍地帶-1
texttw: 還有個很像夢境中三天王的球員！

title: 急凍地帶-4
texttw: 那是三天王的…

title: 急凍地帶-4
texttw: 是三天王裡的幽鬼！這傢伙居然敢出現在這裡，那些失去能力的球隊與他脫不了關係！

title: 急凍地帶-4
texttw: 那我們快追上去！

title: 急凍地帶-5
texttw: 嘿嘿，是守護者們！還有他們找到的救世英雄呀。

title: 急凍地帶-5
texttw: 別囉嗦了，那些球隊是怎麼回事！你幹了什麼！

title: 急凍地帶-5
texttw: 嘿嘿，別擔心～我只是抽走他們的技能晶片，不會死的。

title: 急凍地帶-5
texttw: 再說了，技能晶片本來就是大家都可以拿的。

title: 急凍地帶-5
texttw: 因為它本來就是宙能之聚的碎片呀！哈嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿！

title: 被撕裂的時空-1
texttw: 幽鬼！你說宙能之聚就是技能晶片？怎麼可能！

title: 被撕裂的時空-1
texttw: …很簡單，宙能之聚在穿越時空時遭到擠壓碎裂而化為技能晶片。

title: 被撕裂的時空-1
texttw: 但這些技能晶片連能量碎片都稱不上呢…真正的主體可還沒出現。

title: 被撕裂的時空-1
texttw: 喔，在下阿耳戈斯，廢物幽鬼的夥伴。

title: 被撕裂的時空-1
texttw: 三天王中的阿耳戈斯…！

title: 被撕裂的時空-5
texttw: 是布魯托！布魯托被他們帶走了！可惡！

title: 被撕裂的時空-5
texttw: 布魯托與腐化者有著類似的氣息，他們之間或許有些關聯。

title: 被撕裂的時空-5
texttw: 不僅如此…還要阻止他們繼續強奪技能晶片！

title: 被撕裂的時空-5
texttw: 不過我們找回了競球戰甲，總算可以發揮最大能量了！

title: 戛然而止的混亂-1
texttw: 真是太不公平了…我們可是拯救了許多人，卻得從頭來過！

title: 戛然而止的混亂-1
texttw: 少廢話！這個世界哪裡公平過！實力才是一切！

title: 戛然而止的混亂-1
texttw: 快點比賽！我還趕著要往上爬！

title: 戛然而止的混亂-5
texttw: 這是守關的魔王，許多人在他們的手裡敗下陣來！

title: 戛然而止的混亂-5
texttw: 他們不同於地面上的比賽對手，千萬小心了。

title: 世界的另一端-1
texttw: 快振作起來！我們還有重要的任務要完成！

title: 世界的另一端-1
texttw: 可別輕易放棄了！

title: 世界的另一端-5
texttw: 似乎某些球隊有著腐化者的能力，許多敗陣的球隊完全失去籃球技能了！

title: 世界的另一端-5
texttw: 難道腐化者能夠同化其他人嗎？

title: 世界的另一端-5
texttw: 根據資料…是有這個可能的。

title: 世界的另一端-5
texttw: 如果這樣可就不妙了！我們會來不及阻止他們收集宙能之聚。

title: 世界的另一端-5
texttw: 他們越強大我們的勝算越低，得加快腳步才行。

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-1
texttw: 能夠離開地獄球賽的高級聯盟通關證！

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-1
texttw: 那是我的東西！喵！

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-1
texttw: 別以為你們能輕易拿到，能離開這裡的只有我！！喵！

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-5
texttw: 布魯托！還有賽壬與阿耳戈斯…！布魯托你的眼神，發生什麼事了！

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-5
texttw: …你別想離開這，只有我能離開，只有我！

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-5
texttw: 布、布魯托，我們不是約好，要在星際聯盟大賽對決嗎？

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-5
texttw: 只有我可以得到星際球王頭銜…只有他們能幫我！！！

title: 迎接真正的挑戰-5
texttw: 布魯托…。
